extendedInfo.description: Love watching Joan Rivers and Co. on Fashion Police? Well, this fabulous new app is the perfect accessory for all you snark-happy fashionistas and fashionistos. And it's free!The Fashion Police app gives you access to all the celebrity glitz and glamour from the red carpet to the streets, right at your fingertips.You'll be first to know about the latest Hollywood fashion hits and misses.Play along in our Polls section, where you can vote in your fave Fashion Police segments, including B*tch Stole My Look, Make It Stop/Gotta Have It and Guess Me From Behind.Have hostess with the mostest Joan Rivers rate your outfit via Joan's Jabsâif you dare. Whether it's scathing or, well, really scathing, you know it's going to be hilarious!Get an extra dose of Fashion Police with fresh clips from the show, exclusive bonus footage and extended content.Learn more about the fab hosts, including Kelly Osbourne, Giuliana Rancic and George Kotsiopoulos, with info and personal photos they've shared just with you.With complete fashion coverage from the Oscars, Grammys, Golden Globes and more, this app makes a chic companion for the star-studded, glittering awards season. Plus, connect with Facebook and Twitter to share your VIP access with the world.Keywords: Fashion Police, trends, celebrity, style, beauty, Red Carpet, Joan Rivers, designer, E!, Oscars, awards, dress

reviews.title: Fun app but...
reviews.comment: Joans jabs doesn\'t work on my Samsung galaxy s2.  fun app, tho, love voting in the polls!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow and buggy
reviews.comment: I so badly want to like this app, but it loads SO slowly (upwards of 5 minutes) and rarely performs. Adverts show up fast, but I\'m lucky If I can vote or view pictures once a month.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love this app!! The show is awesome & this app helps me keep up with it =D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: Found it boring and sluggish.  Too bad bc I like the show.  Removing app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not Happy
reviews.comment: Can\'t get this to work on Samsung Galaxy S - extremely slow when it works at all - had to uninstall
reviews.author: Dana Valencia

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Very slow. It takes forever to load not what I was expecting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix joans jabs!
reviews.comment: How many people have to mention this before an update is made?? Joans jabs is not working for anyone. 5 star potential app if you would start taking the time to respond to customer complaints!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start but needs tweaking
reviews.comment: Content overall is good but app is sluggish on Galaxy SIII. Many wrong links. Not all polls working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zte warp 2.3 android
reviews.comment: I. Love this app.  The show is funny as hell and i luv that i can watch clips on the go.  Would b five star if u can stop it from freezing after i watch a couple.  Ty
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Piece of crap!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t even open on my phone uninstalling:(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fashion police app
reviews.comment: The app is great when it works but unfortunately it rarely works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too big
reviews.comment: I would LOVE to have this app but it won\'t move to my sd card. At nearly 12mb it\'s too big!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Infuriating!!!
reviews.comment: I want to love this app but its super slow and it rarely works!! PLEASE IMPROVE!!!!
reviews.author: Angelic Sanders

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I love app it gives u photos,videos and others i use this app alot because i love fashion police
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update please
reviews.comment: I want the update cuz Fashion Police has a new logo and because it\'s been a year since its been updating and its not that good
reviews.author: Eric Ceballos

reviews.title: It\'s Really Something
reviews.comment: I love the way  I can vote during the show and how it keeps me up-to-date on everything in Hollywood fashion.
reviews.author: Brashiya McCray

reviews.title: Nothing works on Samsung s4
reviews.comment: No luck selecting any articles or even accessing bios...
